pages.text: Orbital Lasers are high powered lasers, integrated in the Dyson Sphere. The lasers go into a cooldown after each use, depending on the $(item)Orbital Laser Pattern$() used. While the Dyson Sphere and its components are shared, the laser cooldowns are unique per user.

Many $(item)Orbital Laser Pattern$() require multiple lasers at once to work.$(br)Whilst useful as energy delivery method, terraforming tool or defensive system the usability of the Orbital Lasers drops significantly underground or in distent dimensions
Some machines and tools working with orbital lasers.
